brief_summary.textblock:
The clinical trial was designed to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity against Group
      ACYW135 Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine of Hualan administered on subjects 2 years of
      age and older.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial of Group ACYW135 Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine 002

detailed_description.textblock:
Complying with requirements of the approval letter of clinical trial issued by SFDA
      (Approval Letter No.: 2006L01017), Hualan conducted phase II clinical trial of Group ACYW135
      Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of the
      experimental vaccine.

      The safety end points were the presence of any systemic, local and adverse reaction.
      Evaluation indicators of immunogenicity were bacteriocin levels of groups A, C, Y and W135
      respectively in the serum after the whole vaccination.

intervention.description: 360 subjects were divided into three groups (120 subjects in each group), children (2~6 years of age),  early youth (7~15 years of age) and adult (16~30 years of age) to receive Group ACYW135 Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine, 0.5 ml, one dose regime

clinical_study.official_title: Phase II Clinical Trial of Group ACYW135 Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine

overall_official.affiliation: Immunization Program Institute of Jiangsu Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention

primary_outcome.description: Systemic and local adverse reactions after the vaccination; adverse events

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: 4-fold (seroconversion) and 8-fold increase of bactericidin; GMT and bactericidin increase after immunization

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Prevention
